short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension detects if you are working on local environment and if so, displays simple info widget

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple extension for web developers which detects if current page runs on local host and, if so, displays simple info widget.

This extension is open source and you can find code and more information on GitHub project page: https://github.com/Samik081/local-environment-detector
